verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] meet on June 12 in Singapore , the president tweeted Thursday .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , the president tweeted Thursday .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will meet on June 12 in Singapore] , [ARG0: the president] [V: tweeted] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] .
